comments.body: Do you want to use a ButtonBar here?  That will help get the right padding.
Hmm.. when I try to use a ButtonBar, there is too much padding, and the `more` menu is placed too far down vertically. With Row, there is less padding than there used to be, but it is still too much.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +43,47 @@    return new Material(
      elevation: 1,
      child: new Container(
        height: 44.0,
         child: new Row(mainAxisAlignment: MainAxisAlignment.collapse, children: items)
